description.lang: Custom lighting control is at your fingertips with the GE-branded Z-Wave Wireless Solo Scene Remote. This versatile remote communicates directly with your Z-Wave devices to create a unique, one touch lighting scene as well as to wirelessly dim or brighten the light levels in your home. Once the remote is paired with your devices, you can begin programming the lights to personalize your indoor space. The wireless lighting control has a range of up to 150 feet and can control as many as twenty Z-Wave enabled devices at once.Enjoy a variety of placement options for your lighting controlutilize the included hardware and standard wallplate for wall mounting, detach the remote from the remote wall mount for instant portability or pair the remote with a separate stand for convenient tabletop use. The remote also functions on a scalable system, giving you the freedom to start with one remote and add as many as you need. Take control of your lights with the Z-Wave Wireless Solo Scene Remote.
